page.title: 19Sheriff of Buckinghamshire.
page.content: The High Sheriff of Buckinghamshire for 1985-86 works as estate agent for Lord Hambleden. His office is situated only two minutes walk from the school. He was sworn in on 28th March,1985 by a Justice of the Peace. This office is the oldest office in the country next to the monarchy. His job is to hold together the administration of the county,to keep in contact with the judges and support the chief constable and police. There is much social work to do and a lot of visiting is involved.The position provides opportunities to visit hospitals and schools to see good work going on which often goes unnoticed. As there is much travelling and entertaining to do,a sheriff has to be wealthy but in spite of this,the sheriff is proud to have been chosen.
